alert.note: Alert for Christian; Macon; Sangamon; Shelby (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 05 at 10:59PM CST until March 05 at 11:45PM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Christian County in central Illinois... South central Sangamon County in central Illinois... Northwestern Shelby County in central Illinois... Southwestern Macon County in central Illinois... * Until 1145 PM CST. * At 1058 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over White Oak, or 9 miles east of Virden, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Kincaid, Bulpitt and Jeisyville around 1110 PM CST. Taylorville around 1115 PM CST. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Stonington, Assumption, Blue Mound, Moweaqua and Macon. This includes the following highways... Interstate 55 between mile markers 77 and 83. Interstate 72 between mile markers 129 and 135. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
